channel.title: MoparClassic
channel.description: anybody have the scala-compiler.jar, mine seems corrupt when downloading off github, has problems unzipping.

item.title: MoparClassic
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Vicd, post:6, topic:434652”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=537369.msg3951631#msg3951631 date=1332342848]

I’m gonna do a bit grave digging here now, but I could not find any newer topics regarding to downloading ivy.

After running ant at the hello-ivy folder it gets stuck at

[ivy:retrieve] downloading http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/commons-lang/commons-la ng/2.0/commons-lang-2.0-javadoc.jar ...

I do have the ivy jar file in the ant_home’s lib folder.

Any thoughts?
[/quote]Get a better connection?

heh. I’m not on dial-up.
[/quote]No idea, as I’ve never had that issue.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic
item.dc:creator: @Vicd Vicd
item.description:
@Vicd wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:5, topic:434652”][quote author=Vicd link=topic=537369.msg3951618#msg3951618 date=1332341796]
I’m gonna do a bit grave digging here now, but I could not find any newer topics regarding to downloading ivy.

After running ant at the hello-ivy folder it gets stuck at

[ivy:retrieve] downloading http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/commons-lang/commons-la ng/2.0/commons-lang-2.0-javadoc.jar ...

I do have the ivy jar file in the ant_home’s lib folder.

Any thoughts?
[/quote]Get a better connection?[/quote]
heh. I’m not on dial-up.

Edit: well it successfully downloaded and installed everything now.
But when I try to compile the Mopar Classic’s game server it gets stuck again…

Read full topic

Why not do it properly? Just download ivy and place it in apache ant’s libraries. And it will download them.
